alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:55PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 1255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Coram, or over Middle Island, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Centereach, Shirley, Medford, Ronkonkoma, Manorville, Patchogue, Middle Island, Port Jefferson, Wading River, Center Moriches, Coram, Holbrook, Sayville, Farmingville, and Mastic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
